channel.title: I need help with conneting to server
channel.description: Okay, I just made a server. And i use no-ip to egt the ip and utorrent to portforward the port. Because i don't need to really port forward...I'm using a laptop. Someone help please?

item.title: I need help with conneting to server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Even if your using a laptop you still need to portforward, you can use utorrent, but your firewall has to have the port allowed as well. Im not sure what you need help with though.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with conneting to server
